article_title: What Presidential Candidates Aren’t Saying About Jobs (But Should Be)

twitter.description: It’s presidential election season, so it’s obligatory for all candidates to talk about jobs. You have already heard a lot about jobs being lost to China and Mexico (a strong concern of Donald T...
twitter.title: What the Candidates Aren’t Saying About Jobs (But Should Be)

article_metadata.description: It’s presidential election season, so it’s time for candidates to talk about jobs. Here are important issues you won't hear them mention.
article_metadata.sailthru.title: What the Candidates Aren’t Saying About Jobs (But Should Be)
article_metadata.news_keywords: automation, outsourcing, manufacturing. robots, service sector jobs, china, mexico, presidential candidates, education
article_metadata.sailthru.description: The real issues with trade and unemployment are too complicated for soundbites.
